channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fallen tree on public path blocking the whole path, 20th September
item.description:
Theres a fallen tree on the path blocking the way. When it rains the grass gets muddy and unsafe to walk on it to go around. Also overgrown hedges further down and thorns. This has been fof a few weeks now Got stung twice by wasps (very angry ones) so assume there was a nest nearby too.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 163, Carterhatch Road, Southbury, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged to road, 19th September
item.description:
It’s a danger to cars, cyclists, or pedestrians. The pothole has broken through the tarmac and exposed the base, creating a serious hazard. This road and pavement are in urgent need of repair, not just temporary patching. The surface condition has become unsafe and requires proper resurfacing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dale Road, Crayford, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Manual deep clean request, 19th September
item.description:
Large build of of dirt, weeds and leaves on path. From and including junction of Hayes lane, behind the traffic lights power box, Then all the way up to number 30 All on the same side of the road. Deep manual clean on the path of weeds, rubbish and leaves around trees and afainst walls and hedges.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bromley Common, Bromley Common, London

item.title: Flytipping on Dowlas Street again, 19th September
item.description:
Fly tipping on Dowlas Street next to public bin. This occurs often. Ideally this bin could be relocated as it acts as a beacon and be of better use on Southampton Way that has litter issues.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dowlas Street, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet
